title: To Kill a Mockingbird
short_summary: In 1930s Alabama, Scout Finch witnesses prejudice and injustice as her father Atticus defends a black man falsely accused of assault.

title: The Great Gatsby
short_summary: Jay Gatsby’s lavish lifestyle hides an obsession with Daisy Buchanan, exposing the illusions of love and the moral emptiness of wealth.

title: Pride and Prejudice
short_summary: Elizabeth Bennet navigates love, pride, and misunderstandings with Mr. Darcy while challenging societal norms in Regency England.

title: Moby-Dick
short_summary: Captain Ahab obsessively hunts the white whale, leading the Pequod’s crew into peril and reflections on fate and madness.

title: The Catcher in the Rye
short_summary: Holden Caulfield, a disillusioned teenager, wanders New York City reflecting on adulthood, loss, and his search for authenticity.

title: Brave New World
short_summary: In a future of engineered stability, individuality and freedom are sacrificed, raising questions about science, control, and humanity.

title: Jane Eyre
short_summary: Orphaned Jane Eyre grows into an independent woman, facing love, betrayal, and moral dilemmas as a governess at Thornfield Hall.

title: Animal Farm
short_summary: Farm animals overthrow their owner for equality, but the pigs turn the revolution into tyranny, exposing the corruption of power.

title: The Hobbit
short_summary: Bilbo Baggins joins dwarves on a quest to reclaim their treasure from the dragon Smaug, discovering courage and friendship.

title: Fahrenheit 451
short_summary: In a world where books are outlawed, fireman Guy Montag questions conformity and seeks freedom through forbidden ideas.
A dystopian society of surveillance and propaganda where Winston Smith struggles to preserve truth and individuality.

title: Harry Potter and the Sorcerer's Stone
short_summary: Harry discovers he is a wizard and attends Hogwarts, forming friendships and facing the first shadows of evil.

title: The Alchemist
short_summary: Santiago follows his personal legend on a spiritual journey to Egypt, learning about destiny and dreams.

title: Dune
short_summary: On Arrakis, Paul Atreides navigates betrayal, ecology, and messianic prophecy while fighting for survival.

title: The Little Prince
short_summary: A poetic exploration of friendship and the meaning of life seen through a child’s perspective.

title: The Book Thief
short_summary: In Nazi Germany, Liesel finds refuge in books and the kindness of others while facing the horrors of war.

title: The Kite Runner
short_summary: Amir and Hassan’s friendship in Afghanistan is shattered by betrayal, leading Amir on a path toward redemption.

title: All the Light We Cannot See
short_summary: Marie-Laure, a blind French girl, and Werner, a German boy, endure World War II on parallel paths that intertwine.

title: The Name of the Wind
short_summary: Kvothe tells his life story of music, magic, and his quest for knowledge and truth about mysterious forces.

title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
short_summary: A fellowship unites to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from darkness.
